content.question: If voters are acting according to the retrospective model of voting, which of the following will be the most important consideration in their decision?

choices.label: The party affiliations of the candidates
The campaign promises made by the candidates
The effect of recent economic conditions on the voters
Whether the candidates will act in the best interest of the voters if elected

content.answer: The effect of recent economic conditions on the voters

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior
